Mahatma Goes Forth

Mahatma goes for a peaceful night out on the town

Mahatma in the Country

Mahatma goes for a crazy trip to the countryside

Mahatma in trouble!?

Mahatma finds himself confronted by two ruffians

Mahatma on the Run

Mahatma starts to run in the other direction

Mahatma's Wise Plan

Mahatma shows the ruffians what-for!

Mahatma gets thanked!?

The ruffians thank Mahatma for tripping them over with a banana skin

The Plot Thickens!

The ruffians tell Mahatma that they were being mind-controlled by Dr Zorg, Mahatma's old drinking buddy and the mad-scientist villain of this arc!

Mahatma dons his Hat

Filler episode - flashback to Mahatma's youth before he started to wear his trademark trucker cap

Mahatma and the Cyclops

On his way to confront Dr Zorg, Mahatma is approached by a cyclops who presents him with a riddle

Mahatma the Great

Mahatma has heard the riddle before, and so bypasses weeks of episode content by answering it without hesitation.
